channel.title: Software Development Lifecycle Phases on Rusty Eddy
channel.description: Recent content in Software Development Lifecycle Phases on Rusty Eddy

item.title: Software Development Lifecycle Phases
item.description:
Process is Important

Software like building a house or designing a car is hard. Much like the design and construction of a house or car, software development must be planned, organized and thought through to a great extent before the actual development or building can start.

Once the construction or development starts a series of well defined steps must be adhered to in order to achieve the goal the project originally set out to accomplish. Yet the process needs to be flexible enough to adapt to changes discovered during the course of development, testing and feedback from users. The planning phase all the way through delivery will be best benefited if well defined processes are followed from the planning phase all the way through development.
